Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Woodlawn.
ShortDescription: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island then resume their normal route on 67th, due to fire department activity near 67th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.
